content.text: It's going well! I'm touring with Frank Ocean right now.
Wow, that sounds amazing! What's it like touring with him?
It's so much fun! He's an incredible artist and he has a great team behind him.
I bet! I'm a huge fan of his. What's your favorite song of his?
I'm not sure I could pick just one! But I really love "White Ferrari" and "Nikes".
Those are both great songs! I also love "Pyramids" and "Seigfried".
Me too! They're all so good.
So, what do you do when you're not touring?
I'm a singer-songwriter, and I also produce music.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of music do you like to make?
I mostly make R&B and soul music, but I also dabble in other genres.
That sounds really cool! I would love to hear your music sometime.
Sure! I'll send you a link to my soundcloud.
